1088556304849952769.text: Specifically, this legislation allows Coverdell Education Savings Accounts to be used on home school educational expenses. It is our duty to expand opportunities for the education of our heroes’ children and offer these families the support they deserve.

1088556303105081344.text: Because of frequent moves and a lack of school choice, children in military families feel the negative impact. This is why I introduced the Military Child Educational Freedom Act today.

1088556302178099202.text: Our brave women and men in uniform fight on the front lines for our freedom. Not only are we grateful to our heroes, but also to their families for their service. The average child in a military family moves six to nine times in his or her school career.

1086328297930207233.text: Unfortunately, the Kingdom has not lived up to its promises. The Saudi Educational Transparency and Reform Act of 2019 requires the U.S. State Department to review Saudi textbooks annually and ensure that Riyadh is upholding its pledge to peace.

885860631693463553.text: The time is now to bring a whole gov approach to combat violent extremism. This strategy will serve a vital role in this effort. #FY18NDAA

885860472012115968.text: This amdt requires POTUS to submit a comprehensive, interagency strategy for countering violent extremist groupst. #FY18NDAA

885860262712147968.text: These violent, extremist organizations represent a new type of threat, and we must identify how existing agencies should handle. #FY18NDAA

885860026849644548.text: We’ve seen how terrorist & extremist groups use sophisticated messaging to recruit new members, execute attacks, and raise funds. #FY18NDAA

885529240409706497.text: Grateful to speak to legislators from South Korea & Japan about the threat from North Korea & to discuss my #FY18NDAA amendment. https://t.co/hp8O22MTmi

885331937493176320.text: The #FY18NDAA addresses global threats, like those posed by the totalitarian regime in North Korea. Watch my remarks here: https://t.co/BAFVu2517O

885328798249517056.text: This amdt states our commitment to keeping all options on the table with North Korea--military, diplomatic, and economic. #FY18NDAA

885328202863869953.text: We will not tolerate the escalation by North Korea. The amdt also reaffirms the strong commitment of the US to our allies. #FY18NDAA

885327583189102593.text: Next, I'm going to speak on how #FY18NDAA addresses threats around the globe--specifically the threat from North Korea.

885325545445175296.text: As our military works 2 grow the force to address threats from around the globe, it is irresponsible to close facilities w/o study #FY18NDAA

885324223169912832.text: In testimony before #HASC just last month, SECDEF Jim Mattis stated that he also has reservations about the BRAC assessments. #FY18NDAA

885324077275250688.text: In the past, BRAC has been used w/o conducting a thorough study, incurred significant costs, & jeopardized military communities. #FY18NDAA

885323307654033409.text: Next, I'm standing up for military communities by opposing the lifting of restrictions on BRAC without a comprehensive study. #FY18NDAA

885316272002482176.text: Grateful that my amendment to #FY18NDAA passed by voice vote. https://t.co/BvE5UUJIan

885316086689935360.text: The purpose is simple—US never ratified the CTBTO & protecting American families is the job of Congress, not an intl body. #FY18NDAA

885315710804795392.text: I intro'ed an amdt to restrict funding from the CTBTO, while still providing funds for the international monitoring system. #FY18NDAA

885312582403461121.text: With the proliferation of terrorists around the world, maintaining #GITMO has never been more important. #FY18NDAA https://t.co/cfiYsQxtGR

885304880801472512.text: I'm grateful to speak next on the importance of maintaining #GITMO and preventing transfers to any domestic prisons. #FY18NDAA
